guide.introduction: We discovered this beautiful Japanese tool for scoring cardboard, and it inspired us to make our own version using a bicycle gear.
guide.introduction_rendered: We discovered this beautiful Japanese tool for scoring cardboard, and it inspired us to make our own version using a bicycle gear.

lines.text: To make your very own bicycle gear scoring tool, you need to scavenge the following items:
lines.text_raw: To make your very own bicycle gear scoring tool, you need to scavenge the following items:

lines.text: a steel, adjustable bottom bracket (or bb) cup, 1.37 x 24 threads per inch
lines.text_raw: a steel, adjustable bottom bracket (or bb) cup, 1.37 x 24 threads per inch

lines.text: You can find most of these things new at a good bike shop, but these parts are often thrown out and it is worth looking for used ones.

lines.text: To make a handle for your tool, start by tracing the inside of the lock ring onto a piece of cardboard.
lines.text_raw: To make a handle for your tool, start by tracing the inside of the lock ring onto a piece of cardboard.

lines.text: Now draw a handle shape to your liking and cut it out.
lines.text_raw: Now draw a handle shape to your liking and cut it out.

lines.text: Trace your original handle about five or six times and cut these pieces out.
lines.text_raw: Trace your original handle about five or six times and cut these pieces out.

lines.text: Stack the pieces and glue them together, alternating the direction of the corrugation (this will give it a bit more strength).
lines.text_raw: Stack the pieces and glue them together, alternating the direction of the corrugation (this will give it a bit more strength).

lines.text: Screw the b.b. cup into the freewheel.
lines.text_raw: Screw the b.b. cup into the freewheel.

lines.text: Push the b.b. cup through the hole in your cardboard handle.
lines.text_raw: Push the b.b. cup through the hole in your cardboard handle.

lines.text: Screw the lock ring onto the b.b. cup.
lines.text_raw: Screw the lock ring onto the b.b. cup.

lines.text: Grab a piece of cardboard and try out your new tool!
lines.text_raw: Grab a piece of cardboard and try out your new tool!

lines.text: You can make a wood handle if you like, but you get bonus points for using cardboard.

guide.summary: Turn a freewheel into a cardboard-scoring tool and make cardboard origami!
